summary: Disney is a huge American company that makes movies, TV shows, and runs theme parks. It was started in 1923 by Walt and Roy Disney as a cartoon studio. They made the famous Mickey Mouse in 1928. Over time, Disney grew by making live-action movies, building theme parks, and buying other companies like Pixar and Marvel. After some ups and downs, it became one of the biggest entertainment companies, with lots of different businesses. Disney makes lots of money and has won many awards for its movies and theme parks.
title: The Walt Disney Company
